name: WALTER WHITE MORBIUS RUN 2023 ULTIMATE AWESOME EDITION PRO (NOT CLICKBAIT)
name_original: WALTER WHITE MORBIUS RUN 2023 ULTIMATE AWESOME EDITION PRO (NOT CLICKBAIT)
description:
Help Walter White run from the nightmare that is Morbius! Don't let him fall or perhaps get caught by one of Michael Morbius' clones!

Features:

- Walter White from the hit AMC series Breaking Bad!

- Endless replayability

- Timeless gameplay

- Three possible Endings!

- Morbius!

- Deck Verified! (You do need to map the joystick to A and D for left and right respectively but it works)

- High quality sound and music!

- Does not contain anything illegal whatsoever! (I SWEAR)

So what are you waiting for? Start playing right now!
